replies.body:
Happy birthday!
Thanks! <3 :)
Opinion?
I can't always tell when you're joking or serious, but you're fun to talk to, from the little we've talked. I've always looked up to you in a way. You know what you're doing in terms of Moderating and pretty laid back.
Where do you see Avicus in 6 months?
This depends on what happens with updates over the next month or so. If things go well I could see Avicus starting to grow and the staff team maybe getting more respect for everything they do to help out. If updates don't go so well I don't think Avicus will die, but it won't be good, and it would be tough to come back from.
Honestly, thanks for being so mature over the past few days. <3
I've gotten a lot of this. xD Honestly I was expecting some punishment, and this all started 4(?) days ago. I had plenty of time to think about it, and come to the conclusion that it really doesn't matter either way. It's not like I was being paid, or being forced to be online. I enjoy Avicus and the point of Moderating was to help out. I can still do that without being a Moderator.
replies.body_tagged:
Happy birthday!
Thanks! <3 :)
Opinion?
I can't always tell when you're joking or serious, but you're fun to talk to, from the little we've talked. I've always looked up to you in a way. You know what you're doing in terms of Moderating and pretty laid back.

If things go well I could see Avicus starting to grow and the staff team maybe getting more respect for everything they do to help out. If updates don't go so well I don't think Avicus will die, but it won't be good, and it would be tough to come back from.
Honestly, thanks for being so mature over the past few days. <3
I've gotten a lot of this. xD Honestly I was expecting some punishment, and this all started 4(?) days ago. I had plenty of time to think about it, and come to the conclusion that it really doesn't matter either way. It's not like I was being paid, or being forced to be online. I enjoy Avicus and the point of Moderating was to help out. I can still do that without being a Moderator.

Happy Brithday!!
Thanks! <3
Opinions?
We don't talk a lot, but you're fun to talk to when we do. You're almost always on when I got on, and you're mature when you need to be. ;p
You had a great birthday?
Yeah! I haven't opened my presents yet, and my party is Saturday, so I won't know much until then. :)
Can you post the entire bee movie script on the forums?
LOL Nooooo I can give you this though. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E6iN6VTL7v8
Post your best meme!
If I had a meme, that would work. My favorite is this one though. ;)

replies.body:
opinions
We don't talk a lot but I consider you a pretty good friend. You're fun to talk to, and you're very friendly to new people. (We are all mean to our friends though... ;p)
will walls ever come back and if does do you think it will be good
Yeah I think it will. It might not be really soon, but yes. If it's good or not depends on how much testing they do with Walls players, and how much they listen to everyone. lol
